data.value: The new password shall not match the old password

data.name: msgQuestionCloudChangeLogin
data.value: Do you want update your login password also for the Cloud? Keep in mind that if you don't do this, you won't be able to access to the file saved in the Cloud.

data.name: msgQuestionCloudConn
data.value: You are not logged in to the Cloud. In order to continue with the update, you should login to the Cloud before. Do you want to login to the Cloud?

data.value: Unable to complete the change of the login password. Error:

data.name: msgSessionTimeout
data.value: Your session is expired due session timeout setting

data.name: errExportPwdList
data.value: Error occurred during the export of the password list. Error:

data.name: txtFormatDescJSON
data.value: The password list is exported to a plain text file (unencrypted file) in JSON format. No attachment is included in this format.

data.name: txtFormatDescLIST
data.value: The password list is exported to a encrypted file with .list extension. This is the owned format of PwdCrypter. All the attachments are included.

data.name: txtFormatDescZIP
data.value: The password list is exported to a plain text file (unencrypted file) in JSON format. The ZIP archive contains also all the attachments you have linked to the password.

data.name: errImportPwdList
data.value: Error occurred during the import of the password list. Error:

data.name: msgQuestionPwdImport
data.value: Are you really sure you want to import the password list from external file? Keep in mind that the current list of password will be overwritten.

data.name: errImportWrongPassword
data.value: Unable to access to the source password list. Maybe the access password for that file doesn't match with the current access password.

data.name: errImportPassword
data.value: Error occurred during the import process. Unable to complete the operation.

data.name: txtExportCloud
data.value: Export the passwords stored in the Cloud

data.name: msgQuestionCloudNoConn
data.value: You are not currently logged to the Cloud. Do you want to login now?

data.name: errCloudFileNotFound
data.value: Data not found in the Cloud.

data.name: msgQuestionPwdDonwload
data.value: Are your really sure you want to download the passwords list (and attachments) from the Cloud? Keep in mind that the current list and attachments will be overwritten.

data.name: msgQuestionPwdUpload
data.value: Are your really sure you want to upload the passwords list (and attachments) to the Cloud? Keep in mind that the current list and attachments in the Cloud will be overwritten.

data.name: msgPwdDownloadDone
data.value: Attachments and list of passwords successfully downloaded from the Cloud!

data.name: msgPwdUploadDone
data.value: Attachments and list of passwords successfully uploaded in the Cloud!

data.value: I have got an unlock code

data.name: errInvalidUnlockCode
data.value: Please, insert a valid unlock code

data.name: errUnlock
data.value: Error occurred during the unlock procedure. Error:

data.name: txtUsedUnlockCode
data.value: You are using the following unlock code:

data.name: warnExpireUnlockCode
data.value: You are using an unlock code. For security reason, if you change the master password, you have to insert the new unlock code come from the other platform. Remember that you have to use the same master password also in the other App. Do you want to continue?

data.name: warnPersistentUnlockCode
data.value: You are using a persistent unlock code. Due to the change of your master password, this unlock code has been renewed. In the "About page" you can always see the unlock code you are using. Take note about this new code.

data.name: txtFingerprintReady
data.value: Please, put up your finger against the sensor...

data.name: msgFingerprintReconfigure
data.value: You have enabled the access through fingerprint. You need to reconfigure this setting after changing the master password. Please, go to the security and access page and enroll your fingerprint.

data.name: txtTwoFactorAuth
data.value: Scan the QR code or use the displayed code.

data.value: Error occurred during the configuration of the two factor authentication. Error: {0}

data.name: errTOTPWrongCode

data.name: errTwoFactorConfig2

data.name: errTwoFactorNotAvailable
data.value: Two factor authentication is not available.

data.name: txtRecovyCodeAlert
data.value: Store the recovery code in a safe location. If you lose your phone or your authentication App setting, you will be locked out.

data.name: txtTOTP
data.value: Type the OTP code displayed in your Authentication App.

data.name: txtUseRecoveryCode
data.value: You are not able to get your token? Click here and use the recovery code instead.

data.name: txtTOTPRecoveryCode
data.value: Enter the recovery code. For security reason, a new recovery code will be generated after you have used it.

data.name: txtRecoveryCode
data.value: This is your new recovery code. Store it in a safe location. If you lose your phone or your authentication App setting, you will be locked out.
